context_bundle.summary: Onboarding Pattern: HRIS trigger (new record) -> Pre-start (AD account, O365, equipment order, badge, training assign, welcome email) -> Day 1 (credentials, team intro, calendar) -> Week 1 (check-in surveys, training tracking) -> 30-60-90 (milestones, probation review). 5-day->2-day productivity. $187K/yr value.

onboarding.quick_start: Trigger: HRIS new hire created. 2 weeks before: Create AD, O365, order laptop, assign training, send pre-board email. Day 1: Send credentials, team notification, calendar. Week 1: Survey Day 1,3,5. 30/60/90: Milestone reminders.
common_patterns: Provisioning: AD + O365 + business apps by role template
Check-ins: Automated survey Day 1, 3, 5 to catch issues early
Escalation: Alert HR if any provisioning fails
known_errors: HRIS data quality issues break downstream
Role-based provisioning needs clear role->access mapping
Badge/facilities often manual - build request workflow
Manager not ready = poor experience despite automation
